title: [GAME MODE] URF RAMPAGE
body:
Map: Summoners Rift

Playstile: Blue Team only plays Warwick {{champion:19}} and they need to destroy the enemy big Urf the manatee, until the time's finished. The Purple Team only plays Urf the manatee as champ and they need to defend their big urf.

Rewards: 5 wins = icon with a urf on it. |   10 wins = icon with a urf wearing a crown
 
time: 20 - 30 mins

Purple Team (Urf team): They need to defend the big Urf that replaces the Nexus for 30 minutes. If the purple team succeeds to defend Urf for 30 (or 20) minutes, they win. If not, they loose. Purple team has full map vision on their side (no fog of war on their side)

Blue Team (Warwick team): They need to destroy the enemy big Urf within 30 (or 20) minutes. If they succeed, they win. If not, they loose. Blue team has +15% bonus movement speed.

Urfs base: The Inhibitors are replaced with attracking Urfs, the Nexus is replaced with one big attacking Urf the manatee.

Warwicks base: The Inhibitors are replaced with movement speed boosters, the fountain tower has a range that reaches the end of their base, so the Urfs can't try to destroy the enemy nexus and spawn camp.

I hope you like it and think about it. :)
